Articles.Content:
[http://imgur.com/t1qcoCy](http://imgur.com/t1qcoCy)

What do you guys think? I put a lot of effort into it and it took me awhile but here it is. what do you think?

-Well: Start out with these. Palletes, ideas, Kerbin maps. 

Kerbin maps by me: [Basemap](http://hgfggg.deviantart.com/art/BCSA-BONUS-Kerbin-official-map-447653687?q=gallery%3Ahgfggg%2F50289790&qo=1)

[Colored (for your helpyness)](http://hgfggg.deviantart.com/art/BCSA-BONUS-Kerbin-official-map-447653687?q=gallery%3Ahgfggg%2F50289790&qo=1)

Palletes and stuff by other people: [TACOS pallete](http://www.alternatehistory.com/discussion/attachment.php?attachmentid=169899&stc=1&d=1332030428)

[Earthmaps](http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/doku.php/resources/new_revised_basemap_series)

[UCS pallete](http://wiki.alternatehistory.com/doku.php/resources/universal_colour_scheme)

Thanks for the feedback. I did use a template of a kerbin map I got of Google and I edited it with windows paint(I know its junk but its the best I can do). again Thanks for the feedback I really appreciate it!

> 
> -Well: Start out with these. Palletes, ideas, Kerbin maps. 
> Kerbin maps by me: [Basemap](http://hgfggg.deviantart.com/art/BCSA-BONUS-Kerbin-official-map-447653687?q=gallery%3Ahgfggg%2F50289790&qo=1)
> 
> [Colored (for your helpyness)](http://hgfggg.deviantart.com/art/BCSA-BONUS-Kerbin-official-map-447653687?q=gallery%3Ahgfggg%2F50289790&qo=1)

Do you have a black and white outline version?
What do you mean black and white? If you want the land to be black/white you can just use the bucket fill tool.
